name: NicheSphere
summary: NicheSphere is an sc-verse compatible Python library which allows the user to find differential co-localization domains / niches based on cell type pair co-localization probabilities in different conditions. It also offers the possibility to look at biological process based differential communication between cell type pairs or differential co-localization domains based on Ligand-Receptor pairs expression data, which can be obtained from diverse cell cell communication tools
